editor.name: IRMS.RMS.DUCTLINE_LENGTH_STAT_COUNTY
editor.title: 县级月度承载长度区域统计
editor.sql: SELECT DIS.LABEL_CN AS DISTRICT_NAME, RES.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, RES.CUID, RES.CHECK_MONTH, RES.TRUNK_DUCT_SEG, RES.TRUNK_POLEWAY_SEG, RES.TRUNK_STONEWAY_SEG, RES.TRUNK_UP_LINE_SEG, RES.TRUNK_HANG_WALL_SEG, RES.TRUNK_ALL_SEG, RES.LOCAL_DUCT_SEG, RES.LOCAL_POLEWAY_SEG, RES.LOCAL_STONEWAY_SEG, RES.LOCAL_UP_LINE_SEG, RES.LOCAL_HANG_WALL_SEG, RES.LOCAL_ALL_SEG, RES.ALL_LENGTH, RES.FAULT_SEG_COUNT, RES.RESULT_TYPE FROM DUCTLINE_LENGTH_STAT RES LEFT JOIN DISTRICT DIS ON RES.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID = DIS.CUID WHERE DIS.RELATED_SPACE_CUID = '$RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID$' AND RES.CHECK_MONTH = $CHECK_MONTH$ AND LENGTH(RES.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) = 32 AND RES.RESULT_TYPE = $RESULT_TYPE$ UNION ALL SELECT '总计' AS DISTRICT_NAME, '' AS RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID, '' AS CUID, MAX(RES.CHECK_MONTH) AS CHECK_MONTH, SUM(RES.TRUNK_DUCT_SEG) AS TRUNK_DUCT_SEG, SUM(RES.TRUNK_POLEWAY_SEG) AS TRUNK_POLEWAY_SEG, SUM(RES.TRUNK_STONEWAY_SEG) AS TRUNK_STONEWAY_SEG, SUM(RES.TRUNK_UP_LINE_SEG) AS TRUNK_UP_LINE_SEG, SUM(RES.TRUNK_HANG_WALL_SEG) AS TRUNK_HANG_WALL_SEG, SUM(RES.TRUNK_ALL_SEG) AS TRUNK_ALL_SEG, SUM(RES.LOCAL_DUCT_SEG) AS LOCAL_DUCT_SEG, SUM(RES.LOCAL_POLEWAY_SEG) AS LOCAL_POLEWAY_SEG, SUM(RES.LOCAL_STONEWAY_SEG) AS LOCAL_STONEWAY_SEG, SUM(RES.LOCAL_UP_LINE_SEG) AS LOCAL_UP_LINE_SEG, SUM(RES.LOCAL_HANG_WALL_SEG) AS LOCAL_HANG_WALL_SEG, SUM(RES.LOCAL_ALL_SEG) AS LOCAL_ALL_SEG, SUM(RES.ALL_LENGTH) AS ALL_LENGTH, SUM(RES.FAULT_SEG_COUNT) AS FAULT_SEG_COUNT, $RESULT_TYPE$ AS RESULT_TYPE FROM DUCTLINE_LENGTH_STAT RES LEFT JOIN DISTRICT DIS ON RES.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID = DIS.CUID WHERE DIS.RELATED_SPACE_CUID = '$RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID$' AND RES.CHECK_MONTH = $CHECK_MONTH$ AND LENGTH(RES.RELATED_DISTRICT_CUID) = 32 AND RES.RESULT_TYPE = $RESULT_TYPE$
